definitions.definition: Used for forming superlatives of adjectives, especially those that do not form the superlative by adding -est .
examples: It was the least surprising thing.

definitions.definition: In the smallest or lowest degree; in a degree below all others.
examples: my best routine was the one I had practised the least .
I don't much like housework, and doing the dishes least of all.

main_definition: Used for forming superlatives of adjectives, especially those that do not form the superlative by adding -est .
secondary_definitions: In the smallest or lowest degree; in a degree below all others.
